issue.title: [CF 1349] Lost settings after toon name change
issue.body:
I recently changed a toon's name (and gender, but kept the same race), and all my tmw groups/icons went away.

 

Maybe they are stored/indexed by character name? Is there a way I can restore those settings to my new name?

 

Thanks in advance!


> Posted by CurseForge user petefbsd | Imported from CurseForge issue #1349 | Raw

comments.body:
Figured it out, loaded the old profile. Thanks for such an amazing add-on!

Edited Dec 1, 2016

> Posted by CurseForge user petefbsd
